text: Leonard Kleinrock (born June 13, 1934) is an American engineer and computer scientist. He played an influential role in the creation of the ARPANET, the precursor to the Internet, at UCLA. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Kleinrock discusses his work on the ARPANET. Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:American computer scientists Category:Scientists from New York City
title: Leonard Kleinrock
